member_organisations: None, but the key fora that we currently manage (RTIG and UDG) have a range of members including UK cities, public transport operators, consultancies, and systems suppliers
fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport
head_office_address: Surrey Technology Centre Surrey Research Park
eu_initiatives: Relevant elements of Horizon 2020; ITS Directive; ITS standards mandates; C-ITS Platform
goals__remit: Provide informed research, analysis, advice and management services to stakeholders in public and private sectors about policy, strategy, standards and implementation programmes related to intelligent transport systems
relevant_communication:
Management of key UK ITS fora, focussing on local (city) transport infrastructure and services 
Participation in strategic working groups 
Collaboration with other bodies (including non-UK) 
Member of various CEN WGs 
Within EU: projects POSSE, CIMEC, CODECS
customers: European Commission# Real Time Information Group Ltd# UTMC Ltd# Polis aisbl
